name: Teamtalk
overview: TEAMtalk Media Group Ltd. operates a network of sports Web sites. The company provides sports content for the Internet, mobile and fixed line telephones, and satellite networks. It has two divisions, Content and Mobile. TEAMtalk Mediaâ€™s Content division provides sports content from major global sports. Its coverage spans all major worldwide leagues, cups, and tournaments on both domestic and international. This segment also develop and aggregate content across a range of genres, including lifestyle, news and finance, mobile personalization, and adult entertainment. Its Mobile division provides sports content to mobile phone users through its partnerships with mobile network operators and a host of mobile aggregators, brand agencies, web sites, retail outlets, and national newspapers. The company provides sports content through digital distribution channels to consumers and businesses, as well as communications services to the maritime industry. It has operations in the United Kingdom, the United States, Germany, and Sweden. TEAMtalk Media was incorporated in 2000 and is based in Leeds, United Kingdom. As of August 16, 2002, TEAMtalk Media Group Ltd. is a subsidiary of ukbetting plc.
